assessmentSchemaID.description: This field is required for the update operation

mappedFromCompetencies.description: List of competency IDs that map to this competency

courseParticipationID.description: CourseParticipationID links this phase participation to the overall course participation.

coursePhaseID.description: CoursePhaseID is the unique identifier of the course phase the student is participating in.

passStatus.description:
PassStatus indicates the student's current status in this course phase.
Common values are usually "passed", "failed", and "not_assessed".

prevData.description: PrevData contains metadata from previous phases, passed via course-phase communication

restrictedData.description:
RestrictedData contains sensitive metadata that should only be accessible to authorized users
such as instructors, admins, or the system itself.

student.description: Student contains the complete student information associated with this participation.

studentReadableData.description:
StudentReadableData contains metadata that can be safely shared with the student,
such as feedback, scores, or progress information.

time.description: Time zone will be ignored when encoding to PostgreSQL.

sourceCoursePhaseID.description:
SourceCoursePhaseID is the unique identifier of the course phase to copy from.
This phase serves as the template and its data will be duplicated.

targetCoursePhaseID.description:
TargetCoursePhaseID is the unique identifier of the course phase to copy into.
This phase will receive the copied data and configurations.

currentSemester.description:
CurrentSemester indicates which semester the student is currently in within their program.
This helps with course eligibility, academic planning, and progress tracking.

email.description:
Email is the student's contact email address, must be a valid email format.
This is used for notifications, communications, and account recovery.

firstName.description: FirstName stores the first name as provided during initial application or profile updates.

gender.description:
Gender represents the student's gender identity for demographic and statistical purposes.
Must be one of: "male", "female", "diverse", or "prefer_not_to_say".

hasUniversityAccount.description:
HasUniversityAccount indicates whether the student has been granted access to university systems.
This flag helps determine what services and resources the student can access.

id.description:
ID is the unique identifier for the person using UUID v4 format.
The uuid.UUID type ensures type safety and automatic validation during JSON unmarshaling.

lastName.description: LastName stores the last name as provided during initial application or profile updates.

matriculationNumber.description:
MatriculationNumber is the student's unique university identification number.
This number is assigned by the university and remains constant throughout the student's enrollment.

nationality.description:
Nationality represents the student's nationality or citizenship.
This information may be used for visa requirements, international student services, or statistics.

studyDegree.description:
StudyDegree indicates the type of degree the student is pursuing.
Must be either "bachelor" or "master".

studyProgram.description:
StudyProgram is the specific program or major the student is enrolled in.
Examples: "Computer Science", "Information Systems", "Management and Technology".

universityLogin.description:
UniversityLogin is the student's username for university systems and services.
This login is typically used for accessing library, computing resources, and other university platforms.
